features.title: Simplify Your Financial Life
features.subtitle: Discover the powerful features of FinArea.

feature1.title: Smart Expense Tracking
feature1.description: Upload your bank statements or PDFs, FinArea automatically categorizes your expenses with AI.

feature2.title: Visual Analysis & Reports
feature2.description: Visualize your spending habits with clear charts and monthly reports. See exactly where your money goes.

feature3.title: AI Budget Planning
feature3.description: Forecast your next month's budget based on your past data. Set realistic goals with AI-powered suggestions.

feature4.title: Personalized Recommendations
feature4.description: Discover areas where you can save based on your spending patterns and get tips to improve your financial health.

howItWorks.title: Get Started in Just 3 Simple Steps

step1.title: Connect/Upload Your Data
step1.description: Securely connect your bank accounts or easily upload your PDF statements. Your data is encrypted and protected.

step2.title: Let AI Analyze
step2.description: FinArea's advanced AI processes your data, automatically classifies expenses, and provides meaningful summaries.

step3.title: Plan & Achieve
step3.description: Create your budget, track your progress, and take control of your finances using AI forecasts and personal advice.

whyFinArea.title: A Smart Choice for Your Financial Future
whyFinArea.subtitle: FinArea not only visualizes your data but also supports your financial decisions with AI power, helping you reach your goals faster.

benefitAi.title: Intelligent AI
benefitAi.description: More than just tracking — it understands your data to offer personalized insights and proactive recommendations.

benefitSecurity.title: Bank-Level Security
benefitSecurity.description: Your data is encrypted and stored with the highest security standards. Your privacy is our priority.

benefitUi.title: User-Friendly Interface
benefitUi.description: Even complex financial data is easy to understand with our simple, intuitive, and modern design.

benefitTime.title: Save Time
benefitTime.description: Forget manual data entry and complex calculations. FinArea automates processes to save you time.

finalCta.title: Take the First Step Toward Financial Freedom!
finalCta.subtitle: Join FinArea for free today and start managing your money smarter.
